dict.string:
This project started out as a web application and grew into this app due to some curiousity about how to make an iOS app. I started a couple years ago and finally got back to it and am now releasing it!
There's two gestures related to the application at this time, a single tap to rotate to the next generated image/quote/font or double tap to stop the timer running in the background if you want to stop and look at the image and quote on screen.
Images courtsey of Unsplash (https://unsplash.com)
